name: Blue Angels Aerobatic Flight Simulator
description: Become part of the BLUE ANGELS TEAM; try the aerobatic simulator licensed by the U.S. Navy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (2Ghz) or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD series 5000 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1100 MB available space Additional Notes: Please disable G-Sync to avoid bugs
